com.mathgame.database

Class GameAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mathgame.database.MySQLAccess
      • com.mathgame.database.GameAccess

  • public class GameAccess
extends MySQLAccess
    The GameAccess class handles interactions between the client and the database. Specifically, this class adds, displays, and removes users.
